keyMoments.title: Battles Galley-La Foremen
keyMoments.description: Luffy is attacked by multiple Galley-La foremen including Kaku, Paulie, Rob Lucci, Lulu, and Tilestone who declare the Straw Hats wanted dead or alive.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Luffy fighting against those who believe Robin attacked Iceburg, demonstrating his determination despite being outnumbered.

keyMoments.title: Infiltrates Galley-La Headquarters
keyMoments.description: Luffy bursts through a window to gain entry to Galley-La Company headquarters to confront Iceburg directly.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Luffy's direct approach to problems and his need to hear the truth from Iceburg himself.

keyMoments.title: Confronts Iceburg About Robin
keyMoments.description: Luffy demands to hear Iceburg's side of the story about who attacked him, seeking the truth about Robin's alleged involvement.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Luffy's loyalty to his crew and his need to understand the situation before making judgments.

keyMoments.title: Accused of Attacking Iceburg
keyMoments.description: Paulie reveals that Iceburg identified Robin as one of two people who attacked him, shocking the Straw Hats and putting them at odds with Galley-La.
keyMoments.significance: This accusation becomes the central mystery of the Water 7 arc and sets in motion Robin's departure from the crew.
keyMoments.quote: Iceburg explained that two people attacked him: a tall man with a mask and the other being Nico Robin.

keyMoments.title: Iceburg Wants to See Robin Again
keyMoments.description: Despite being attacked, Iceburg tearfully tells Luffy he wants to see Robin one more time.
keyMoments.significance: Suggests complex emotions and history between Iceburg and Robin, hinting at deeper motivations beyond a simple assassination attempt.
keyMoments.quote: I want to see Robin one more time.

keyMoments.title: Identifies Robin as Attacker
keyMoments.description: Iceburg identifies Nico Robin and a masked man as the two people who attacked him.
keyMoments.significance: This identification drives the conflict between the Straw Hats and Galley-La Company.

keyMoments.title: Emotional Request to See Robin
keyMoments.description: Iceburg tearfully requests that Luffy bring Robin to him, despite confirming she attacked him.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals complex emotions toward Robin and hints at a deeper story involving their relationship and the Pluton blueprints.
keyMoments.quote: I want to see Robin one more time.

relationships.description: Iceburg identifies Robin as one of his attackers but tearfully requests to see her one more time, suggesting a complex history.

evolutionMoments.description: Iceburg confirms Robin attacked him but emotionally asks to see her again.

keyMoments.title: Exhaustion from Coup de Vent
keyMoments.description: Franky is shown exhausted after using his Coup de Vent attack, with his hair limp as a sign of depleted energy. He declares he will chase Luffy again once recharged.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the energy cost of Franky's powerful attacks and establishes his cola-powered system mechanics.
keyMoments.quote: My Coup de Vent exhausted me and my hair is a sign of this. I promise to chase after Luffy again once I am recharged.

abilities.description: Franky connects both his arms with a T-shaped pipe and fires a cannonball of compressed air. The attack is powerful but drains his cola energy significantly.

reveals.information: Coup de Vent attack drains Franky's energy significantly, indicated by his hair going limp

keyMoments.title: Reveals Robin as Iceburg's Attacker
keyMoments.description: Paulie explains to the Straw Hats that Iceburg identified two attackers: a tall man with a mask and Nico Robin.
keyMoments.significance: Paulie acts as the messenger who creates the conflict between the Straw Hats and Galley-La Company.
keyMoments.quote: Iceburg explained that two people attacked him: a tall man with a mask and the other being Nico Robin.

keyMoments.title: Attacks Luffy with Ropes
keyMoments.description: Paulie uses his rope techniques to trap Luffy, warning him there's no place to run or hide.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Paulie's loyalty to Iceburg and his role as one of Galley-La's protectors.
keyMoments.quote: There is no place to run or hide.

keyMoments.title: Warns About Aqua Laguna
keyMoments.description: Paulie explains that the Aqua Laguna is approaching and there are only two ways to leave Water 7: by ship or by the next Sea Train.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces the time constraint that adds urgency to the Water 7 arc's events.
keyMoments.quote: The Aqua Laguna is going to hit soon and there are only two ways you could leave Water 7: by your ship or by the next Sea Train.

keyMoments.title: Attacks Luffy with Blades
keyMoments.description: Kaku cuts Luffy's face with a thrown weapon and declares the Straw Hats wanted dead or alive. He later pins Luffy to the wall with his blades.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Kaku's combat abilities and creates dramatic irony as he's actually one of the real attackers working undercover for CP9.
keyMoments.quote: Luffy and the rest of the Straw Hats are wanted: dead or alive.

keyMoments.title: Fights Luffy with Large Saw
keyMoments.description: Rob Lucci attacks Luffy with a large saw, jumping at him and cutting the rope he was grabbing onto.
keyMoments.significance: Creates dramatic irony as Lucci is one of the actual attackers of Iceburg while pretending to protect him from the Straw Hats.

keyMoments.title: Escapes Using Headbutt
keyMoments.description: In an anime-only scene, Nami escapes from a man holding her by headbutting him.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Nami's resourcefulness and combat capabilities even without her usual weapons.

keyMoments.title: Accompanies Luffy to Galley-La
keyMoments.description: Nami makes it to Galley-La Company headquarters with Luffy, navigating the dangerous situation in Water 7.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Nami's dedication to helping Luffy find the truth about Robin.

keyMoments.title: Allows Luffy to Enter Iceburg's Room
keyMoments.description: Kalifa notices Luffy infiltrating the building but allows him to get into Iceburg's room while informing other shipwrights that Luffy hasn't been around.
keyMoments.significance: This is one of many hints at Kalifa's true allegiance to CP9, as she manipulates the situation while appearing loyal to Galley-La.

reveals.information: Kalifa shows suspicious behavior by allowing Luffy to reach Iceburg while lying to other shipwrights

keyMoments.title: Rushes to Warn Usopp About Aqua Laguna
keyMoments.description: Sanji rushes with Chopper to warn Usopp about the approaching Aqua Laguna storm.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Sanji's concern for his crewmate despite Usopp having left the crew.

name.japanese: トニートニー・チョッパー

keyMoments.title: Rushes to Warn Usopp About Aqua Laguna
keyMoments.description: Chopper rushes with Sanji to warn Usopp about the approaching Aqua Laguna storm.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Chopper's concern for Usopp despite the recent conflict.
